title: The Fate of Lee Khan [Widescreen]
creator_credit: King Hu, Golden Harvest and King Hu Film Productions
brief_description: A martial arts historical epic of deceit, vengeance, treachery and bloody retribution. In 1366 Yuan dynasty China is ruled by Mongol invaders. Lee Khan, a ruthless, decadent aristocrat and master swordsman, and his beautiful but heartless sister, attempt defend their corrupt legacy of privilege and power. They face defeat when group of Chinese national revolutionaries organize and wage a great uprising against their Mongolian oppressors. Cast includes Angela Mao, Hsu Feng, Roy Chiao. In Cantonese with English subtitles.
